body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Larry Campbell and the customer's name is Sara Davis.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Larry Campbell. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Larry, I'm Sara Davis. I've been having some issues with my bike.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara! I'm here to help. Can you please tell me what kind of issues you're experiencing with your bike?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's been making a strange noise whenever I accelerate, and I'm not sure why.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how concerning that can be. I would like to gather a little more information to assist you better. Could you please provide me with your bike's model year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's a two thousand twenty-one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you! And can you also share the last four digits of your vehicle identification number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Sara. I will look into your issue and see how we can resolve it. We value our customers and want to ensure you're satisfied.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Larry. I'm feeling a bit stressed about this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Sara. We're here to take that stress off your shoulders. Thank you for your time today, and we'll follow up with you shortly regarding your bike. Have a great day!
